title: How to deactivate the Grammarly Keyboard on iPhones
content:
If you prefer to use the standard iOS keyboard instead of the Grammarly Keyboard, please tap the globe icon in the lower-left corner of your keyboard.
If you need to check your text with Grammarly, you can switch back by tapping the globe icon again.
If you'd still like to turn off the Grammarly Keyboard for iOS, please follow these steps:
Open
Settings
on your iOS device.
Go to
General
>
Keyboard
>
Keyboards
>
Edit
.
Delete Grammarly from the list and tap
Done
.
To uninstall the Grammarly app from your device, please see the instructions below:
Touch and hold Grammarlyâ€™s companion app.
Tap
Remove App
.
Tap
Delete
App
then tap
Delete
to confirm.
